log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":"<svg width="400" height="250">
  <rect x="10" y="50" width="380" height="200" fill="#764A2C" stroke="#BDBABA"/>

  <!-- Mountains in the front -->
  <polygon points="10,150 150,70 290,70 400,150" fill="#FABD38" stroke="#BDBABA"/>
  <!-- Mountains behind the first ones -->
  <polygon points="40,160 160,90 320,90 360,160" fill="#FEBE7A" stroke="#BDBABA"/>

  <!-- The sun -->
  <circle cx="50%" cy="30%" r="40" fill="#FFD700" stroke="#FFFF99"/>
</svg>","file_name":"./images/sunset.svg"}

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":" Sunset Over Mountains

Enjoy the Sunset!

","file_name":"./index.html"}
